description.english: Confront the Alchemists in the Library
description.french: Affronter les Alchimistes dans la bibliothèque
description.german: Konfrontiere die Alchemisten in der Bibliothek
description.japanese: 図書館で錬金術師と戦う
description.schinese: 对阵图书馆中的炼金术士
description.spanish: Enfréntate a los alquimistas en la biblioteca.

description.japanese: ゴブリンキングを倒す
description.spanish: Derrota al rey trasgo.

description.japanese: 予言者の試練をクリアする
description.spanish: Supera la prueba del Oráculo.

description.brazilian: Restaure o equilíbrio ao Palácio do Sol
description.english: Restore balance to the Sun Palace
description.german: Bringe den Sonnenpalast wieder ins Gleichgewicht
description.italian: Ripristina l'equilibrio del Palazzo del sole.
description.japanese: 太陽宮殿の調和を取り戻す
description.spanish: Restablece el equilibrio en el Palacio del Sol.

description.brazilian: Recupere um tesouro perdido há muito tempo
description.italian: Recupera il tesoro perduto da tempo.
description.japanese: はるか昔に失われた宝物を見つける
description.spanish: Recupera un tesoro perdido hace mucho tiempo.

description.japanese: ライバルとして認めさせる
description.schinese: 证明自己是个有价值的对手
description.spanish: Demuestra que estás a la altura como rival.

displayName.spanish: El oculoco que todo lo ve

description.brazilian: Descubra a fonte dos poderes de Marduk
description.english: Uncover the source of Marduk's powers
description.french: Découvrez la source des pouvoirs de Marduk
description.german: Die Quelle von Marduks Macht aufdecken
description.italian: Svela l'origine dei poteri di Marduk.
description.japanese: 作業場廃墟でのストーリーをクリアする
description.schinese: 揭开马尔杜克力量的来源
description.spanish: Descubre el origen de los poderes de Marduk.

description.japanese: アンダーワールドでのストーリーをクリアする
description.spanish: Explora las catacumbas prohibidas.

displayName.japanese: ずっとここにいようよ！

description.french: Entrer dans la Terre des Blobs
description.japanese: ブロブランドを見つける
description.spanish: Accede a la tierra de los blobs.

description.japanese: マルドゥクを倒す
description.spanish: Derrota a Marduk.

description.japanese: モンスターを初めてふ化させる
description.spanish: Haz que nazca tu primer monstruo.

description.japanese: タヌキのタマゴを手に入れる
description.spanish: Recibe un huevo de tanuki.

description.french: Terminer une bataille avec cinq étoiles
description.german: Erreiche fünf Sterne in einem Kampf
description.japanese: バトルで五つ星評価をもらう
description.spanish: Completa un combate con 5 estrellas.

displayName.japanese: チャンピオンハンター

description.japanese: キーパーランサーに昇格する
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango de Lancero Criador.

displayName.german: Du wirst es nicht kommen sehen
displayName.russian: Ты и глазом моргнуть не успеешь

description.brazilian: Derrote todos os monstros em um único turno
description.english: Defeat all monsters in a single turn
description.french: Vaincre tous les monstres en un seul tour
description.german: Besiege alle Monster in einer einzigen Runde
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i mostri in un solo turno.
description.japanese: 1ターンですべてのモンスターを倒す
description.russian: Победить всех монстров за один ход
description.schinese: 在一回合内击败所有魔物
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los monstruos en un único turno.

description.japanese: シフトモンスターをゲットする
description.spanish: Obtén un monstruo alterado.

description.brazilian: Descubra a entrada de uma sala secreta
description.italian: Scopri un ingresso nascosto di una stanza.
description.japanese: 隠し部屋の入り口を見つける
description.schinese: 发现一个隐藏房间入口
description.spanish: Descubre la entrada de una habitación oculta.

description.japanese: モンスターを進化させる
description.spanish: Haz que evolucione un monstruo.

displayName.japanese: 努力は決して裏切らない

description.english: Receive a 5 star score in the Champion Challenge
description.french: Obtenir un score de 5 étoiles dans le Défi des Champions
description.italian: Ottieni un punteggio di 5 stelle nella Sfida dei Campioni.
description.japanese: チャンピオンチャレンジで五つ星評価を得る
description.schinese: 在精英魔物挑战中获得5星
description.spanish: Obtén 5 estrellas en el reto de Campeones.

description.japanese: 装備品を50個強化する
description.spanish: Mejora 50 piezas del equipo.

description.brazilian: Complete vinte e cinco batalhas na Arena Infinita OU PvP
description.english: Complete twenty five battles in the Infinity Arena OR PvP
description.french: Terminer vingt-cinq batailles dans l'Arène infinie ou en JcJ
description.german: Schließe 25 Kämpfe in der Unendlichen Arena ODER im PvP-Modus ab
description.italian: Completa 25 battaglie nell'Arena infinita OPPURE in modalità PvP.
description.japanese: インフィニティアリーナかPvPでバトルを25戦行う
description.russian: Провести 25 боев на Арене бесконечности или в режиме PvP
description.schinese: 在无限竞技场或PvP中完成二十五场战斗
description.spanish: Completa 25 combates en la arena infinita o JcJ.

description.brazilian: Receba uma recompensa do Exército de Monstros
description.english: Receive a reward from the Monster Army
description.french: Recevoir une récompense de l'Armée des monstres
description.german: Erhalte eine Belohnung von der Monsterarmee
description.italian: Ricevi una ricompensa dall'esercito dei mostri.
description.japanese: モンスターアーミーの報酬を受け取る
description.schinese: 从魔物军队处获得一件奖励
description.spanish: Recibe una recompensa del ejército de monstruos.

description.english: Help out a resident of the Sanctuary
description.japanese: サンクチュアリの住民を助ける
description.spanish: Ayuda a un habitante del Santuario.

description.brazilian: Cause mais de 10.000 de dano em um único acerto
description.english: Deal over 10,000 damage in a single hit
description.french: Infliger plus de 10 000 points de dégâts en un seul coup
description.german: Verursache über 10.000 Schaden mit einem einzigen Treffer
description.italian: Infliggi più di 10.000 unità di danni in un colpo solo.
description.japanese: 1ヒットで10,000ダメージ以上与える
description.russian: Нанести одним ударом более 10 000 ед. урона
description.spanish: Inflige más de 10 000 puntos de daño con un único impacto.

description.japanese: 野生のモンスターとのバトルを200戦勝利する
description.spanish: Gana 200 encuentros con monstruos salvajes.

displayName.japanese: 教えることはもう何もない

description.brazilian: Vença todos os desafios do Instrutor Gotthelm
description.english: Beat all of Trainer Gotthelm's challenges
description.french: Surmonter tous les défis du dresseur Gotthelm
description.german: Besiege alle Trainer in Gotthelms Herausforderungen
description.italian: Vinci tutte le sfide dell'Allenatore Gotthelm.
description.japanese: デュエル講師ゴットヘルムのチームすべてを倒す
description.schinese: 在与驯魔人哥特海姆的所有挑战中胜出
description.spanish: Supera todos los retos del entrenador Gotthelm.

description.brazilian: Obtenha pelo menos 25 x em um Combo
description.english: Achieve at least a 25 x Combo
description.french: Réussir au moins un combo x25
description.japanese: 25x以上のコンボを成功させる
description.spanish: Logra un combo de al menos 25 impactos.

displayName.japanese: サンクチュアリの伝説

description.japanese: キーパーマスターに昇格する
description.spanish: Alcanza el rango de Maestro Criador.

description.brazilian: Doe 100 monstros para o Exército de Monstros
description.english: Donate 100 Monsters to the Monster Army
description.french: Donner 100 monstres à l'Armée des monstres
description.japanese: モンスターアーミーにモンスターを100匹寄付する
description.schinese: 向魔物军队捐赠100只魔物
description.spanish: Dona 100 monstruos al ejército de monstruos.

description.japanese: マップすべてを踏破する
description.spanish: Descubre todo el mapa.

description.japanese: すべてのモンスターをゲットする
description.spanish: Hazte con todos los monstruos.

description.brazilian: Receba 5 estrelas contra todos os Campeões
description.english: Receive 5 star scores against all Champions
description.french: Obtenir des scores de 5 étoiles contre tous les Champions
description.italian: Ottieni un punteggio di 5 stelle contro ogni Campione.
description.japanese: すべてのチャンピオンとのバトルで五つ星評価を得る
description.russian: Получить 5 звезд в боях против всех исполинов
description.schinese: 在面对所有精英时获得五星
description.spanish: Consigue puntuaciones de 5 estrellas contra todos los Campeones.

description.brazilian: Complete o treinamento do Velho Buran
description.german: Schließe das Training des Alten Buran ab
description.japanese: 老人ブランの訓練を完了する
description.spanish: Completa el entrenamiento del Viejo Buran.

description.german: Sorge für Ruhe in den Blauen Höhlen
description.japanese: 青の洞窟の平和を取り戻す
description.spanish: Lleva la paz a las Cuevas Azules.

displayName.japanese: いざ忘れ去られた世界へ

description.brazilian: Entre onde nenhum Guardião jamais esteve
description.english: Tread where no Keeper has gone before
description.french: Aller là où aucun Gardien n'est allé
description.german: Gehe hin, wo noch nie zuvor ein Hüter gewesen ist
description.italian: Avventurati dove nessun Guardiano è mai stato prima.
description.japanese: キーパー未踏のエリアへと足を踏み入れる
description.russian: Пройдите там, где пока не ступала нога ни одного хранителя.
description.schinese: 踏入驯魔人从未涉足的领地
description.spanish: Visita un lugar que no ha pisado antes ningún Criador.

description.brazilian: Salve o Andarilho de sua prisão congelada
description.english: Free the Wanderer from their icy prison
description.french: Libérer le Vagabond de sa prison glacée
description.german: Befreie den Wanderer aus seinem eisigen Gefängnis
description.italian: Libera il Vagabondo dalla sua gelida prigione.
description.japanese: 流浪者を氷から解放する
description.schinese: 将流浪者从寒冰牢狱中解救出来
description.spanish: Libera al merodeador de su prisión de hielo.

displayName.brazilian: Mas isso é uma história pra depois...
displayName.english: But that's a tale for another time…
displayName.german: Diese Geschichte wird ein andermal erzählt …
displayName.russian: Но это уже совсем другая история…

description.brazilian: Restaure a Árvore do Mundo e aprenda sobre a verdadeira forma do seu Familiar Espectral
description.english: Restore the World Tree and learn about the true form of your Spectral Familiar
description.french: Restaurer l'Arbre monde et apprenez la véritable forme de votre familier spectral
description.german: Rette den Weltenbaum und erfahre von der wahren Gestalt deines Spektralbegleiters
description.italian: Risana l'Albero del mondo e scopri la vera forma del tuo Famiglio spettrale.
description.japanese: 世界樹を修復し、スペクトル・ファミリアの真の姿について話を聞く
description.russian: Восстановите Мировое древо и узнайте, какова истинная форма вашего призрачного фамильяра.
description.schinese: 治愈世界之树，并了解你的幽灵使魔的真正形态
description.spanish: Restaura el árbol del mundo e investiga la forma verdadera de tu familiar espectral.

description.brazilian: Equipe um Bardo completamente com instrumentos
description.english: Fully equip a Bard with instruments
description.french: Équiper entièrement un barde de ses instruments
description.german: Rüste einen Barden mit allen Instrumenten aus
description.italian: Equipaggia un Bardo con i suoi strumenti.
description.japanese: バードの装備すべてを楽器にする
description.schinese: 用乐器让一名吟游诗人装备全满
description.spanish: Equipa por completo a un bardo con instrumentos.

description.brazilian: Alcançe o nível máximo com um Monstro
description.english: Reach max level with a Monster
description.french: Atteindre le niveau maximal avec un monstre
description.german: Erreiche das maximale Level eines Monsters
description.italian: Raggiungi il livello massimo con un mostro.
description.japanese: モンスターが最大レベルに到達する
description.spanish: Alcanza el nivel máximo de un monstruo.

description.japanese: すべてのスキンをアンロックする
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los atuendos alternativos.

description.french: Remporter tous les combats de Gardiens légendaires
description.italian: Vinci tutte le battaglie dei Guardiani leggendari.
description.japanese: 伝説のキーパーバトルすべてに勝利する
description.schinese: 赢下所有的传奇驯魔人之战
description.spanish: Vence todos los combates de Criadores legendarios.
